query:
SELECT 
  'Mercados' as entidade,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  MIN(DATE(createdAt)) as primeira_data,
  MAX(DATE(createdAt)) as ultima_data
FROM mercados_unicos

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Clientes' as entidade,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  MIN(DATE(createdAt)) as primeira_data,
  MAX(DATE(createdAt)) as ultima_data
FROM clientes

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Concorrentes' as entidade,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  MIN(DATE(createdAt)) as primeira_data,
  MAX(DATE(createdAt)) as ultima_data
FROM concorrentes

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Leads' as entidade,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  MIN(DATE(createdAt)) as primeira_data,
  MAX(DATE(createdAt)) as ultima_data
FROM leads;
